short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a list of bookmarks in descending order from newest to oldest, grouped by the day they were added.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When the popup is scrolled, a bubble containing the date is displayed next to the scrollbar. The date can be displayed in many different languages, and the extension supports both light and dark themes. Based on the Recent Bookmarks extension by zamtools.
